details:
adjective
- full of hardship or trials
= example: full of hardship or trials
= synonyms: rough
- abounding in rocks or stones
= example: abounding in rocks or stones
= synonyms: stony, bouldery, bouldered
- causing or characterized by jolts and irregular movements
= synonyms: rough, jolty, jolting, jumpy, bumpy
- liable to rock
= example: liable to rock
